extensionName.message: Adblock bakeng sa YouTube™ — best adblocker

extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Ho tseba ka lekunutu, Adblock e sireletsehileng bakeng sa YouTube™. E thibela Lipapatso ho YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock bakeng sa Youtube™ e bolokiloe hoo e ka bang. $savedTime$ bophelo bohle ba hao.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

videoBranding.message: E hloekisitsoe ke Adblock bakeng sa YouTube™

displayVideoBranding.message: Hlahisa lintlha tsa katoloso ka tlase ho video

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Hlahisa palo ea likopo tse thibetsoeng ka beche
